description: A single Ranked Choice Voting (RCV) race
title: RCV Election

___tiebreak.description: the candidate that should be chosen in each successive tiebreak to give the results as reported in the results value

___counts.description: In a test, this array specifies how many of each of the ballots in votes will appear. Can be used for a compressed form of tests

___votes.description: all of the votes in the election

___ranks.description: The rankings on this ballot, ordered from first to last within the list

items.description: A rank selection. Is an array because it allows overvotes

___id.description: A unique identifier for each ballot

___results.description: a record of what happened as the election was tabulated

___record.description: a round by round summary of the results of the election

___tally.description: the number of first choice selections for some/all of the candidates

___isTest.description: Value that is always true if it exists, could later be used to specify some useful info about the test
